title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Supplied video obtained Thursday, October 17, 2019, of US President Donald Trump speaking to reporters at the White House during a bilateral meeting with the president of the Italian Republic. Trump answers questions over the ongoing impeachment inquiry and says Nancy Pelosi has created a "phoney witch-hunt." "I think she's done this country a tremendous disservice," he says. "This is an open and shut simple case, they're desperate because they know they are going to lose the election." (AAP VIDEO/Supplied/White House)
